location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The letter has suffered from insect damage which has obscured words in the first sentence.

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the Resident's communication of 10 October 1816 and informing him that letters he addressed to the Prince at Shiraz and His Majesty's Charg√© d'affaires have been approved by the Governor in Council.
